verbs.description: [ARG1: First lady Melania Trump] [V: returned] [ARG4: to the White House] [ARGM-TMP: Saturday morning] [ARGM-TMP: after a five - day stay in the hospital] , [ARGM-ADV: according to the first lady 's communications director , Stephanie Grisham] .
First lady Melania Trump returned to the White House Saturday morning after a five - day stay in the hospital , [V: according] to the first lady 's communications director , Stephanie Grisham .
